Method Detail

getObjectFactory

public static com.topcoder.util.objectfactory.ObjectFactory getObjectFactory(java.lang.String namespace,
                                                                             java.lang.String propertyName)
                                                                      throws SearchBuilderConfigurationException
Get the Object Factory instance with the given namespace and property name.

Parameters:
namespace - the namespace of the configuration
propertyName - the name of the property
Returns:
a ObjectFactory instance according the configuration
Throws:
SearchBuilderConfigurationException - if can not get the ObjectFactory successfully

loadClassAssociator

                                                                               throws SearchBuilderConfigurationException
Load the ClassAssociator from the namespace configuration.

Parameters:
namespace - the namespace to be loaded
Returns:
a ClassAssociator according the configuration
Throws:
SearchBuilderConfigurationException - if can not load successfully

getConfigProperty

public static java.lang.String getConfigProperty(java.lang.String namespace,
                                                 java.lang.String propertyName,
                                                 boolean mandatory)
                                          throws SearchBuilderConfigurationException
Gets the string property value of the property name. When the property is mandatory, it must exist in the configuration manager.

Parameters:
namespace - the namespace where the configuration is read.
propertyName - the property name of the property to be read.
mandatory - true if the property is mandatory; false otherwise.
Returns:
the string value of the property in the configuration.
Throws:
SearchBuilderConfigurationException - if namespace is missing in configuration; or the property is missing in the configuration and the property is mandatory; or accessing the configuration manager fails.

mandatory - true if the property is mandatory; false otherwise.
Returns:
the Property value of the property in the configuration.
Throws:
SearchBuilderConfigurationException - if namespace is missing in configuration; or the property is missing in the configuration and the property is mandatory; or accessing the configuration manager fails.

getRealName

public static final java.lang.String getRealName(java.lang.String alias,
                                                 SearchContext searchContext)
Get the real Name with the alias the context.

Parameters:
alias - the alias, maybe it is already the real name
searchContext - the context used when build search
Returns:
the real name

buildDBSimpleFilter

public static void buildDBSimpleFilter(AbstractSimpleFilter filter,
                                       java.lang.String operateKey,
                                       SearchContext searchContext,
                                       java.lang.Object value)
                                throws UnrecognizedFilterException
Build the search String for Simple Filter, include NullFilter, EqualsToFilter, and RangeFragmentBuilder. The filter is for database. This method is added in version 1.3.

Parameters:
filter - the Simple Filter to be built on.
operateKey - the operate key
searchContext - the context of the building
value - the value of the filter, can be null
Throws:
UnrecognizedFilterException - if can not get all the inner builder successfully

buildDBAbstractAssociativeFilter

public static void buildDBAbstractAssociativeFilter(AbstractAssociativeFilter filter,
                                                    java.lang.String connectKey,
                                                    SearchContext searchContext)
                                             throws UnrecognizedFilterException
Build the search String for AbstractAssociativeFilter, the filter is for database. This method is added in version 1.3.

Parameters:
filter - the AbstractAssociativeFilter to be built on.
connectKey - the connect key, 'AND' for AndFilter, 'OR' for OrFilter
searchContext - the context of the building
Throws:
UnrecognizedFilterException - if can not get all the inner builder successfully

buildLDAPSimpleFilter

public static void buildLDAPSimpleFilter(AbstractSimpleFilter filter,
                                         java.lang.String operateKey,
                                         SearchContext searchContext,
                                         java.lang.Object value)
                                  throws UnrecognizedFilterException
Build the search String for Simple Filter, include NullFilter, EqualsToFilter, and RangeFragmentBuilder. The filter is for LDAP. This method is added in version 1.3.

Parameters:
filter - the Simple Filter to be built on.
operateKey - the operate key
searchContext - the context of the building
value - the value of the filter, can be null
Throws:
UnrecognizedFilterException - if can not get all the inner builder successfully

buildLDAPAbstractAssociativeFilter

public static void buildLDAPAbstractAssociativeFilter(AbstractAssociativeFilter filter,
                                                      java.lang.String connectKey,
                                                      SearchContext searchContext)
                                               throws UnrecognizedFilterException
Build the search String for AbstractAssociativeFilter, the filter is for LDAP. This method is added in version 1.3.

Parameters:
filter - the AbstractAssociativeFilter to be built on.
connectKey - the connect key, '&' for AndFilter, '|' for OrFilter
searchContext - the context of the building
Throws:
UnrecognizedFilterException - if can not get all the inner builder successfully

checkList

public static void checkList(java.util.List list,
                             java.lang.String listName,
                             java.lang.Class expectedClass)
Check the list valid.The list should not be null also should not be empty. The mothed also check the items in the list which also should be with the expected class type. This method is added in version 1.3.

Parameters:
list - The list to be checked
listName - the Name of the list, which denote the usage of the list
expectedClass - the expected class the items should be
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the list is null, the items in it is null, or empty String

checkaliasMap

public static void checkaliasMap(java.util.Map map,
                                 java.lang.String mapName)

Check the aliasMap valid.The map should not be null also should not be empty. The mothed also check the key and value in the map which also should not be null. More, both the key and value should String type.

This method is updated in version 1.3.

Parameters:
map - The map to be checked
mapName - the Name of the map, which denote the usage of the map
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the map is null, if the keys and values illegal

checkfieldsMap

public static void checkfieldsMap(java.util.Map map,
                                  java.lang.String mapName)
Check the fieldsMap valid.The map should not be null also should not be empty. The mothed also check the key and value in the map which also should not be null. More, key should be String type, and value should be ObjectValidator type.

This method is updated in version 1.3.

Parameters:
map - The map to be checked
mapName - the Name of the map, which denote the usage of the map
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the map is null, or the map is empty or the keys and values illegal

checkSearchBundleMap

public static void checkSearchBundleMap(java.util.Map map,
                                        java.lang.String mapName)
Check the SearchBundleMap valid.The map should not be null also should not be empty. The mothed also check the key and value in the map which also should not be null. More, key should be String type, and value should be SearchBundle type.

This method is updated in version 1.3.

Parameters:
map - The map to be checked
mapName - the Name of the map, which denote the usage of the map
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the map is null, or the map is empty or the keys and values illegal
